activities.name: ORA GET CNT
activities.description: 저장된 값의 Total 값을 확인하기 위해 DB조

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT NVL(max(qty), 0) as total_cnt FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = ''', pipeline().parameters.ServiceId, ''' ORDER BY row_id DESC ')

text.value:
INSERT INTO cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq (type, row_id, qty, crt_dt, crt_user) 
VALUES (
  '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}'
  , (SELECT NVL(MAX(row_id), 0) + 1 FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}')
  , '@{variables('endIdx')}'
  , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhhmiss')
, 'system'
);

query.value:
select a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.include_keyword,',') as include_keyword
      ,a.exclude_keyword 
      ,string_agg(a.include_keyword,'||') as api_include_keyword
      , case when replace(a.exclude_keyword ,',','||') = '' then '%23%40VK%23S1%23%EC%A0%95%EC%B9%98'
            else replace(a.exclude_keyword ,',','||')  || '%23%40VK%23S1%23%EC%A0%95%EC%B9%98'
            end as api_exclude_keyword_new
      ,replace(a.exclude_keyword ,',','||') as api_exclude_keyword
  from (
		select gubun   
		      ,reason 
		      ,keyword		    
		      ,exclude_keyword 
		      ,case when regexp_match( include_keyword,',') is not null then '('||replace(include_keyword,',','&&')||')'
		            else include_keyword
		        end include_keyword         
		  from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_keyword
       ) a              
group by  a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword  
       ,a.exclude_keyword 
order by a.gubun, a.reason, a.keyword
;

delete from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}';


insert into cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data
(
 "date" 
	,gubun
	,reason
	,keyword
	,include_keyword
	,exclude_keyword 
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
)
select "date" 
	,gubun
	,reason
	,keyword
	,include_keyword
	,exclude_keyword 
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
 from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data_temp
 where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}'
 and writername in
 (
  'KBS'
,'SBSBiz'
,'강원도민일보'
,'강원일보'
,'경향신문'
,'국민일보'
,'국제신문'
,'노컷뉴스'
,'농민신문'
,'뉴스1'
,'뉴시스'
,'대전일보'
,'데일리안'
,'동아일보'
,'매일경제'
,'머니투데이'
,'문화일보'
,'부산일보'
,'아시아경제'
,'연합뉴스'
,'이데일리'
,'조선일보'
,'중앙일보'
,'파이낸셜뉴스'
,'한겨레'
,'한국경제'
,'한국일보'
,'헤럴드경제'
 );

select 1 as su;

select a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,',') as inculde_keyword
      ,a.exculde_keyword 
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,'||') as api_inculde_keyword
      ,replace(a.exculde_keyword ,',','||') as api_exculde_keyword
  from (
		select gubun   
		      ,reason 
		      ,keyword		    
		      ,exculde_keyword 
		      ,case when regexp_match( inculde_keyword,',') is not null then '('||replace(inculde_keyword,',','&&')||')'
		            else inculde_keyword
		        end inculde_keyword         
		  from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_keyword
       ) a              
group by  a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword  
       ,a.exculde_keyword 
order by a.gubun, a.reason, a.keyword

WITH vw_last_date AS (
	SELECT 
    to_char(now() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD') as start_date,
     to_char(now() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD') as end_date
)
select b.key_id, b.topic, unnest(array['blog','twitter&excludeKeyword=rt','news','insta','community']) as channel
, a.start_date, a.end_date
from vw_last_date a
, (
select topic, key_id from cd_portal.tb_topic_master
where use_yn = 'Y'
and new_traker  = 'N'
and key_id between '001' and '040'
) b

delete from  cd_ods.tb_vive_topic_association_tran_t;

select 1 as success;
select cd_ods.fn_vive_topic_association_tran_update();

	SELECT

)

WITH vw_last_date AS (
	SELECT 
    to_char(DATE_TRUNC('month', current_date - interval '6 month'), 'YYYYMMDD') as start_date,
     to_char(now() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD') as end_date
)
select b.key_id, b.topic, unnest(array['blog','twitter&excludeKeyword=rt','news','insta','community']) as channel
, a.start_date, a.end_date
from vw_last_date a
, (
select topic, key_id from cd_portal.tb_topic_master
where use_yn = 'Y'
and new_traker  = 'N'
and key_id between '001' and '040'
) b

select '20250801' as start_date, '20250831' as end_date, channel, c.keyword, c.include_keyword, c.exclude_keyword from 
unnest( array['twitter','blog','news','insta','community','youtube_new']) as channel, 
cd_ods.temp_vive_api_test_topic c
;
select cd_mart.func_dm_fm_association_frequency();
